scripts.build:chrome: npm run build:shared && renamer dist/manifest-chrome.json --replace manifest.json && rimraf ./dist/manifest-firefox.json
scripts.build:firefox: npm run build:shared && renamer dist/manifest-firefox.json --replace manifest.json && rimraf ./dist/manifest-chrome.json
scripts.build:shared: npm run clean && tsc --build && copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.!(ts) dist
